ygData.subject: Re: Sneak
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, You get it at 17...by the time you might have it maxed I figure you might as well use Shari s Sonorous Clouding (I think it s Shari s?), which you
ygData.messageBody:
>From: CMai <CMai@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Sneak
>Date: Thu, 20 May 1999 13:42:28 -0400
>
>From: CMai <CMai@...>
>
>From an old rogue, sneak is a skill that will allow u to walk very quietly
>by violent creatures. U know if sneak is working if u start walking half
>of
>your walk speed. The sneak skill at high lvl like in the 80's or higher
>will allow u to sneak by many creatures of yellows and down. I would not
>try it against a red though. The chances of not being seen is slim. The
>sneak skill is very useful for retrieving your dead body and Pick pocketing
>but since we do not have it then it is mostly good for retrieving your
>body.
>With our speed song we can just run by all creatures. Who need to sneak?
>I
>hoped this help.
>
>Your Friendly Rogue and Bard,
>Hammerpaw and Samiam
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Basil Eckert [mailto:athelas@...]
>Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 12:43 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Sneak
>
>
>From: Basil Eckert <athelas@...>
>
>Hail fellow Bards!
>
>I would be really glad if anyone could explain me the use of the sneak
>skill. I haven't seen one person in the game who could explain me how it
>works
>and what it really does. It is said that monsters can't hear you when your
>sneaking, but I really doubt that this is very usefull. I don't know either
>how to use it correctly. Do you have to be in walk mode to start sneaking?
>Sometimes I just can't hit the sneak button for hours, i don't know why.
>I would really appreciate every kind of help...
>
>Athelas
>Tarew Marr, lv 18
>

Well, You get it at 17...by the time you might have it maxed I figure you
might as well use Shari's Sonorous Clouding (I think it's Shari's?), which
you get shortly after. Unless of course the mobs you are passing can see
invisible. I found that Sonorous Clouding is one of the coolest methods of
retrieving your own corpse as well as party members' corpses because, as
most of us know, you become visible when looting. On the very next tick of
the song you become invisible again. We used this to get a friend's corpse
who was pulling mobs for us from deep within the Lost Temple of Cazic Thule.
He got lost in the maze (he went through the first door to the right in the
courtyard) and was gangbanged by sentinels and defenders. He was worried he
wouldn't get all of his gear back, but we laid those fears to rest in short
order. It is also great for resting your party in a hostile area.

Sartori of Kelethin
